track.name: Blue Shoes
comments: Would be even better if KM were to lower her tone and try a little vibrato..................
She is so good !!! I love her newest 2012  CD .. ~~~~(* v *)~~~~
I feel like a lonely ballerina, lol
Around about 1956/7 Carl Perkins was singing about his 'Blue suede shoes', which song  was then appropriated by Elvis Presley.
this song seems to suit my soul too! I love it so much!!!!!!!!
